name: NPR
text:
In his new book, CNN's Brian Stelter says President Trump's "cozy" relationship with Sean Hannity is "like nothing we've seen in American history" — and describes the president as a "shadow producer" for the Fox News host.
https://t.co/32jlfdiZ2x

name: NPR
text:
Speaking at #RNC2020, Navajo Nation Vice President Myron Lizer offered praise for President Trump and Supreme Court Justice Neil Gorsuch.

It comes a week after Jonathan Nez — Navajo Nation president — spoke in a keynote in support of Joe Biden at the DNC. https://t.co/tuPElm4f9A
